title: Starta Price Hits $0.67 on Top Exchanges (STA)
content: Starta (CURRENCY:STA) traded 85.7% higher against the U.S. dollar during the 24-hour period ending at 17:00 PM Eastern on June 2nd. In the last week, Starta has traded up 29.1% against the U.S. dollar. Starta has a market cap of $3.48 million and $808.00 worth of Starta was traded on exchanges in the last 24 hours. One Starta token can currently be purchased for $0.67 or 0.00008770 BTC on cryptocurrency exchanges including Waves Decentralized Exchange and Tidex.    Here’s how other cryptocurrencies have performed in the last 24 hours:    Ripple (XRP) traded 4.3% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.64 or 0.00008407 BTC.  Stellar (XLM) traded up 4.2% against the dollar and now trades at $0.30 or 0.00003914 BTC.  IOTA (MIOTA) traded up 0.9% against the dollar and now trades at $1.89 or 0.00024749 BTC.  TRON (TRX) traded up 5.3% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0610 or 0.00000799 BTC.  NEO (NEO) traded up 3.8% against the dollar and now trades at $56.56 or 0.00740923 BTC.  Tether (USDT) traded down 1.1% against the dollar and now trades at $0.99 or 0.00012957 BTC.  VeChain (VEN) traded up 9.5% against the dollar and now trades at $3.72 or 0.00048676 BTC.  Binance Coin (BNB) traded up 4.8% against the dollar and now trades at $14.71 or 0.00192636 BTC.  Ontology (ONT) traded 10.4% higher against the dollar and now trades at $7.77 or 0.00101838 BTC.  Zilliqa (ZIL) traded up 7.7% against the dollar and now trades at $0.12 or 0.00001554 BTC.   About Starta     Starta’s genesis date was July 4th, 2017. Starta’s total supply is 5,293,348 tokens and its circulating supply is 5,200,017 tokens. Starta’s official Twitter account is @startaico and its Facebook page is accessible here . The official website for Starta is startaico.com .  Starta Token Trading    Starta can be traded on these cryptocurrency exchanges: Waves Decentralized Exchange and Tidex. It is usually not possible to buy alternative cryptocurrencies such as Starta directly using US dollars. Investors seeking to acquire Starta should first buy Bitcoin or Ethereum using an exchange that deals in US dollars such as Coinbase , Changelly or GDAX. Investors can then use their newly-acquired Bitcoin or Ethereum to buy Starta using one of the aforementioned exchanges.
